<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_rte_eb_multi_in_script_operation"><sys_rte_eb_multi_in_script_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><conditional_fields/><conditional_script><![CDATA[/* Example Script
(function(batch, output) {
    for (var i = 0; i < batch.length; i++) {
        
        // step1: access the input variables
        var a = batch[i].input;

        // step2: your script code goes here
        var b = a + " (Now)";

        // setp3: set the output for each element
        output[i] = b;
    }
})(batch, output);
*/
(function(batch, output) {
    // add your code here
    
})(batch, output);]]></conditional_script><is_conditional>false</is_conditional><name>Multiple Input Script - related_handheld_1,u_udid</name><operation_group/><order>901</order><script><![CDATA[(function(batch, output) {
	for (var i = 0; i < batch.length; i++) {
		var input = batch[i].input; // Value of the input columns concatenated with '|'. 
		// Access input column values by their names, ex: batch[i]column_name

     var array = input.split("|");


     output[i] = array[0] + "|" + array[1];
     
	}
})(batch, output);
]]></script><source_sys_rte_eb_field/><source_sys_rte_eb_fields>296ca0a21b2a745092ce8514604bcb8c,27eb009a1bea345092ce8514604bcbfd</source_sys_rte_eb_fields><sys_class_name>sys_rte_eb_multi_in_script_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-09-15 03:49:57</sys_created_on><sys_id>0fec68e21b2a745092ce8514604bcb67</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Multiple Input Script - related_handheld_1,u_udid</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ws1uem" source="x_vmw_ws1uem">b110a7a11b12b41092ce8514604bcb28</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_rte_eb_definition display_value="VMware Workspace ONE ITSM Connector">ecabc85a1bea345092ce8514604bcb31</sys_rte_eb_definition><sys_rte_eb_entity display_value="temp">beebcc5a1bea345092ce8514604bcbb2</sys_rte_eb_entity><sys_scope display_value="ws1uem">b110a7a11b12b41092ce8514604bcb28</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_rte_eb_multi_in_script_operation_0fec68e21b2a745092ce8514604bcb67</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-09-15 03:51:20</sys_updated_on><target_sys_rte_eb_field display_value="cmdb_handheld_related">cbec68e21b2a745092ce8514604bcb65</target_sys_rte_eb_field><target_sys_rte_eb_fields/><type display_value="Multiple Input Script">a5584ee4739000102b6265a751ab9eae</type><use_unique_input_sets>true</use_unique_input_sets></sys_rte_eb_multi_in_script_operation></record_update>
